about_the_game:
Relive the arcade era! Select from 8 unique characters and brawl your way to victory in Neon Krieger Yamato - solo or with a friend! A genre mashup of Japanese 90s gaming, its goal is to capture a mix of stylish combos, sidescrolling action, and twitch combat puzzles, presented in a pixel art cyberpunk world harkening to the days of 16 bit.






Different Characters, Different Playstyles
Select your character for the playstyle you prefer! Every character has their own moveset.


Unleash Combos and Super Attacks
Brawl your way to victory with gigantic combos and devastating super attacks!


Unique Stage Mechanics
Every stage has unique mechanics making every level its own puzzle.

  • Single Player or Local Co-op
  • Sidescroller Mix of Brawler, Platformer, and Fighting Game Mechanics
  • 8 Selectable Characters
  • Unique Playstyle and Movesets for each Character
  • Juggle Combo System
  • Time and Combo Attack Challenges
  • Epic Boss Battles
  • Handcrafted Pixel Art

A genre mashup of Japanese 90s gaming, its goal is to capture a mix of stylish combos, sidescrolling action, and twitch combat puzzles, presented in a pixel art cyberpunk world harkening to the days of 16 bit.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB NVidia or ATI Graphics Card
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Graphics: 2 GB+ NVidia or ATI Graphics Card
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.7+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB NVidia or ATI Graphics Card
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.9+
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB+ NVidia or ATI Graphics Card
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: Neon Krieger Yamato

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT/s 4XX or Equivalent
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 600 Series or Higher
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Relive the arcade era! Select from 8 unique characters and brawl your way to victory - solo or with a friend! A genre mashup of Japanese 90s gaming, it mixes stylish combos, sidescrolling action, and twitch combat puzzles, set in a pixel art cyberpunk world harkening to the days of 16 bit.
